headline: Cathie Wood Is Buying Joby—JPMorgan Calls It A Top Short
summary: Cathie Wood is doubling down on flying taxis. JPMorgan is betting against them. In a new thematic research report, JPMorgan Chase & Co (NYSE:JPM) named Joby Aviation Inc (NYSE:JOBY) one of its top short ideas, arguing the stock trades at an aggressive premium despite a long road to certification, commercialization, and profitability. Meanwhile, Cathie Wood has recently bought the stock through ARK Invest, framing Joby as a core bet on the future of urban air mobility. The clash sets up one of th
